title: patching failed and were not sure why error 404
body:
everytime i login i see ''patching failed and were not sure why not error 404'' and then the play button is stuck at 0%.
when i change to legacy client it says unspecified error has occured please check the logs for more information
pls help

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having problems connecting to the patching servers, and I'm assuming the unspecified error on the legacy client is at or above 33%.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot!  Let me know if you have any questions!
